---
category: news
title: "AI pets nip at the human-animal bond"
excerpt: "Several types of robot pets hit the market in 2023. China’s Unitree Robotics this year launched GO1, the world’s first intelligent quadruped robot. The AI companion walks on all fours and follows humans around like a dog, but doesn’t need a collar or leash. Instead, its movements — including obstacle avoidance and navigation — are fueled by AI."
